channel.title: [317]How to change play max stat[317]
channel.description:
[b][u]Tutorial by - Saair[/u][/b] [b][u]Difficulty - .1/10[/u][/b] [b][u]Files modified - Client.java[/u][/b]
[b]Explaining[/b] What i mean by when i say "player max stat" is that you are changing the payer skill, :
[ul][li]Strength[/li] [li]Attack[/li] [li]Defence[/li] [li]Etc[/li][/ul]
Now usually, Sources have max stat level at 99. Now i was roaming through my client.java and i found his
[code] } else if(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) >= 96 && getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) <= 99) { playerLevel[5] += 31; } [/code]
Now i said lemme try something and i changed the <=99 to <= 122 and the playerLevel[5] += 31; to playerLevel[5] += 51
And compiled and i typed ::master 10 times and all skills reached 122 and i typed 10 more times and it didnt Move!!
[b][u]How to do it[/u][/b]
[b][u]Steps[/u][/b]
[ol][li]Open Client.java[/li] [li]Type "CTRL + F" and search for "<= 99"[/li] [li]When you get there Change the "99" to whatever you want the max level to be.[/li] [li]Then change the 31 to whatever you want the combat level to be when they get max level of one skill.[/li][/ol]
[b][u]Frequently Asked Questions[/u][/b] Q = When i compile and run and type master it doesnt go to My selected Max level A = You need to type ::master over and over.
Q = How is this any good? A = You can be creative and make a custom skill cape for that level.
Q = I get an error in compiling Help me! A = If it says - Missing character, Make sure it looks like this [code] } else if(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) >= 96 && getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) <= (wanted max)) { playerLevel[5] += (cb lvl wanted when reached max); } [/code] Q = When i search for <= 99 i dont find it Help Me! A = Maybe 99 isnt the max level, Like allstar scape v2 source is a bad source. A2 = try searching for 99 only till u see the what u want.
[b][u][size=18pt]CREDITS[/size][/u][/b] 12% ~ JDKPlay - Helping me search the client.java 80% ~ Saair (me) - Making tut and coding the server 5% ~ Delta - Providing Base source 3% ~ Soruce - Providing base source

item.title: [317]How to change play max stat[317]
item.dc:creator: @xldarkwinglx xldarkwinglx
item.description:
@xldarkwinglx wrote:

Thanks alot! I’m gunna use this when I make summoning and may e I’ll boost the max skill to 125 :). Just 1 question. If you have players that have over the next level in xp will it level them up to the farthest it can? For example say the player gets 99 and the next level after that it says the next level is at 15000000 xp. If they had say 16000000 xp would they level up to 100? Hope someone can answer!

item.title: [317]How to change play max stat[317]
item.dc:creator: @TaF TaF
item.description:
@TaF wrote:

Tutorial by - Saair
Difficulty - .1/10
Files modified - Client.java

Explaining
What i mean by when i say “player max stat” is that you are changing the payer skill, :

[ul][li]Strength[/li]
[li]Attack[/li]
[li]Defence[/li]
[li]Etc[/li][/ul]

Now usually, Sources have max stat level at 99. Now i was roaming through my client.java and i found his

} else if(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) >= 96 && getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) <= 99) {
			playerLevel[5] += 31;
		}

Now i said lemme try something and i changed the <=99 to <= 122 and the playerLevel[5] += 31; to playerLevel[5] += 51

And compiled and i typed ::master 10 times and all skills reached 122 and i typed 10 more times and it didnt Move!!

How to do it

Steps

[ol][li]Open Client.java[/li]
[li]Type “CTRL + F” and search for “<= 99”[/li]
[li]When you get there Change the “99” to whatever you want the max level to be.[/li]
[li]Then change the 31 to whatever you want the combat level to be when they get max level of one skill.[/li][/ol]

Frequently Asked Questions
Q = When i compile and run and type master it doesnt go to My selected Max level
A = You need to type ::master over and over.

Q = How is this any good?
A = You can be creative and make a custom skill cape for that level.

Q = I get an error in compiling Help me!
A = If it says
- Missing character, Make sure it looks like this } else if(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) >= 96 && getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) <= (wanted max)) { playerLevel[5] += (cb lvl wanted when reached max); }
Q = When i search for <= 99 i dont find it Help Me!
A = Maybe 99 isnt the max level, Like allstar scape v2 source is a bad source.
A2 = try searching for 99 only till u see the what u want.
